channel.title: Help me please :S
channel.description:
well here is my problem when i try editing something like npcdrops or npcautospawn or making a shop i get
exeption in thread "main" java.lang.numberformatexception : forinput string "2025 11019 1 100 at java.lang.numberformatexeption.forinputstring<unkown source> at java.lang.integer.parseint<unkown source> atnpchandler.loadnpcdrops<npchandler.java:2035> at npchandler.<init><npchandler.java:547> at server.main<server.java:110>
well this whas when i whas trying to add npc drop the drop whas a twin godswordblade
well please help me !!!
[SOLVED tnx to xmonster rep him ! XD]

item.title: Help me please :S
item.dc:creator: @xmonster xmonster
item.description:
@xmonster wrote:

you need to click tab when you go to the next one for example

npcid = 600… tab. 3222…tab 3666

Read full topic
